name: Berberian
description:
A super simple but challenging platformer.  

Controls: 

Move : WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: K or Space

Attack: L or LMB

Controller is also compatible.

This game was made years ago, in the period of a week. As a birthday present for a friend of mine. It was one of my first platformers, it's really nothing special. I made it really hard so i can offer him a challenge. Decided to upload it now! Sorry for the clunkiness and terrible colliders! I really didn't know what i was doing... Have fun!

Music from : WOWSoundsg + Trevor Lentz 

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/battle-rpg-music-pack/

https://opengameart.org/content/at-what-cost

https://opengameart.org/content/hidden-oasis

Cheat : If you want to skip a level press f2
